entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
